item.title: Perimeter of Ignorance
item.description: “As the area of our knowledge increases, so too, does the perimeter of our ignorance” — Neil DeGrasse Tyson One of the many quotables from one of the great science communicators. A key reason in selecting this quote is due to its graphical representation. The visualization above shows how increasing area (\(A\)) leads to an increase in perimeter (\(C\)) by virtue of the increase in radius (\(r\)) which is the key component of both equations.
